articles.title: Israel, Hamas agree to cease-fire to end bloody 11-day war - The Associated Press
articles.description: JERUSALEM (AP) — Israel and Hamas agreed to a cease-fire Thursday, halting a bruising 11-day war that caused widespread destruction in the Gaza Strip, brought life in much of Israel to a standstill and left more than 200 people dead.

articles.title: Biden administration unable to continue $300 weekly pandemic unemployment benefits that GOP governors are slashing - CNN
articles.description: The Labor Department has exhausted its options for continuing to pay an extra $300 a week in federal unemployment benefits to jobless people in the 22 GOP-led states that are ending them early, an administration official told CNN Thursday.
